original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > p:nth-child(4) > a

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: © | Experts Database | Toronto (Canada) | 1-888-978-5418 | info@expertisefinder.com | Home | Privacy | User Agreement

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.83:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #3f51b5, surrounding text: #333333)

relatedNodes.html: © | Experts Database | Toronto (Canada) | 1-888-978-5418 | info@expertisefinder.com | Home | Privacy | User Agreement

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.83:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #3f51b5, surrounding text: #333333)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
